content: Hey @Nell Shamrell-Harrington -- so we've been working on refining the lang-team process
and there are some things that I think should show up in TWIR
but I'm not sure what precisely shoudl be listed and how to get TWIR to be aware of them most easily
specifically I think that when we have FCP pending on a project, we should make sure this is in TWIR
Do you mind giving me some examples? Then I can recommend a place in the newsletter and, any time you want to include something, you can do a PR to the this-week-in-rust github repo
@Nell Shamrell-Harrington I'm talking about PRs like this one, that propose charters for new project groups: https://github.com/rust-lang/lang-team/pull/42
in particular, when they enter pre-FCP and the like
although I see that the rfcbot didn't add all the usual labels
not sure what configuration I need to do there...
